Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Q:

How do I start an audio file somewhere in the middle?

A:

In all of the Miles APIs (2D digital, MIDI, streaming, and 3D digital), when you call the "start" function (like AIL_start_sample, for example), the sound will restart at the beginning of the audio file.

So, to play an audio file from the middle, open the sound file, skip to an offset, and then start the playback with one of a "resume" function (like AIL_resume_sample).
